# Spider Speaker
## Overview
You have an intrinsic connection to arachnids that allows you to communicate with them.

## Effects
- You gain the ability to comprehend and verbally communicate with spiders and other arachnids. The knowledge of the creatures is limited by Intelligence, but at a minimum, the arachnids can give you information about nearby locations and monsters, including whatever they can perceive or have perceived within the past days. You may be able to persuade an arachnid to perform a small favor for you, at the GMâ€™s discretion.
- You gain advantage on Wisdom (Animal Handling) checks pertaining arachnids.
